batchEdit.noNextPage: Cannot set marcher coordinates to next page. There is no next page
batchEdit.noPreviousPage: Cannot set marcher coordinates to previous page. There is no previous page
batchEdit.setAllToNext: Set all marcher coordinates to next page
batchEdit.setAllToNextSuccess: Successfully set all {count} marcher coordinates on page {currentPage} to the coordinates of the next page {nextPage}
batchEdit.setAllToPrevious: Set all marcher coordinates to previous page
batchEdit.setAllToPreviousSuccess: Successfully set all {count} marcher coordinates on page {currentPage} to the coordinates of the previous page {previousPage}
batchEdit.setSelectedToNext: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to next page
batchEdit.setSelectedToNextSuccess: {count, plural, one {Successfully set {count} marcher coordinate on page {currentPage} to the coordinates of the next page {nextPage}} other {Successfully set {count} marcher coordinates on page {currentPage} to the coordinates of the next page {nextPage}}}
batchEdit.setSelectedToPrevious: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to previous page
batchEdit.setSelectedToPreviousSuccess: Successfully set {count} marcher coordinate{count, plural, one {} other {s}} on page {currentPage} to the coordinates of the previous page {previousPage}

cursor.lineMode: Create a line out of the selected marchers

file.importMusicXml: Import MusicXML file to get measures
file.insertAudio: Load new audio file into the show

shape.applyQuick: Snaps marchers to shape without creating an editable object
shape.create: Creates a new shape with lines or curves that can be edited across pages

swap.mustSelectTwo: Can only swap when 2 marchers are selected.

analyticsOptIn.description: To help us improve OpenMarch, we collect analytics data, error logs, and session captures. This helps us understand how you use the app and identify bugs. Read our privacy policy to learn more.
analyticsOptIn.settings: You can change this setting at any time in the app settings.
analyticsOptIn.title: Help Us Improve OpenMarch

editableBeatPlayer.description: Drag the right edge of any beat to adjust its duration

coordinateRoundingSettings.groupNotice: Does not yet work with groups
coordinateRoundingSettings.title: Coordinate Rounding
coordinateRoundingSettings.xStepDescription: Left-click to cycle forward, right-click to cycle backward through X-step options
coordinateRoundingSettings.yStepDescription: Left-click to cycle forward, right-click to cycle backward through Y-step options

exportCoordinates.coordinatesError: Error: Could not calculate coordinates for marcher page {id}
exportCoordinates.exportNotAvailableDescription: Export requires field properties, at least one non-default page, and at least one marcher.
exportCoordinates.exportSuccess: {count, plural, one {Successfully exported coordinate sheets for {count} marcher!} other {Successfully exported coordinate sheets for {count} marchers!}}
exportCoordinates.fieldPropertiesRequired: Field properties are required for export

funPhrase.0: Get ready to march a perfect 8 to 5! 🎺
funPhrase.1: Getting the files to cover down 📋
funPhrase.8: Aligning the formation like a pro 📐

exportCoordinates.individualChartsTooltip: Create customized drill chart PDFs for each individual marcher.
exportCoordinates.individualChartsTooltipDescription: If this is not checked, one overview drill chart PDF will be created.
exportCoordinates.organizeBySectionTooltip: Create PDF files for each individual marcher, organized in folders by section.\nIf this is not checked, one large PDF file will be created with every coordinate sheet in score order.
exportCoordinates.pageNotFound: Error: Page not found for marcher page {id}
exportCoordinates.svgExportFailed: SVG export for {drillNumber} failed with error: {error}
exportCoordinates.title: Export

general.exportField.tooltip: Export this field to a file to use in other projects

fieldProperties.applyFieldTypeWarning: Marchers will not move to the new field type size, they will stay where they are on the canvas. You can always change back the field type.

checkpoint.fieldLabelTooltip: The label to appear on the field (i.e., the yard markers)
checkpoint.name: Name
checkpoint.nameTooltip: Name your checkpoint whatever you want. This is just for you to know what checkpoint you're selecting.
checkpoint.shortNameTooltip: The primary name of the checkpoint. (E.g. "45 Yard Line - Side 1")
checkpoint.stepsFromCenterTooltip: The number of steps away from the center of the field that this checkpoint is. Negative is towards the back.
checkpoint.stepsFromFrontTooltip: The number of steps away from the front of the field that this checkpoint is. Negative is towards the back.
checkpoint.useAsReferenceTooltip: If this checkpoint should be used as a reference for coordinates.
checkpoint.visibleTooltip: If this checkpoint should be visible on the field

errors.noPropertiesToLoad: No field properties to load! This should never happen, please reach out to support
errors.notDefined: FieldProperties is not defined. This should never happen, please reach out to support.

labels.stepsFromFrontToAwayLabelBottom: Steps from front to away label bottom
labels.stepsFromFrontToAwayLabelTop: Steps from front to away label top
labels.stepsFromFrontToHomeLabel: Steps from front to home label bottom
labels.stepsFromFrontToHomeLabelTop: Steps from front to home label top

messages.measurementModificationNote: These values can be modified by adjusting the X and Y coordinates, the step size and the background image
messages.refreshNote: Below values may not be applied until after a refresh

fieldProperties.title: Field Properties

tooltips.conformMethod: Whether to fit the background image inside the field or fill it. The aspect ratio is always maintained
tooltips.fieldName: The name or title of the field template
tooltips.halfLineXInterval: The interval that half lines appear in the UI on the X axis from the center of the field. Leave empty to omit half lines on the X-axis. This is purely cosmetic and does not affect coordinates in any way
tooltips.halfLineYInterval: The interval that half lines appear in the UI on the Y axis from the front of the field. Leave empty to omit half lines on the Y-axis. This is purely cosmetic and does not affect coordinates in any way
tooltips.importImage: Import an image to display on the field
tooltips.leftAbbreviation: E.g. "S1", "AL" or "SR" (short for "Side 1", "Audience Left" or "Stage Right")
tooltips.measurementSystem: The unit of measurement to define the step size in. Can go back and forth
tooltips.resetTheme: Reset the theme to the default values
tooltips.rightAbbreviation: E.g. "S2", "AR" or "SL" (short for "Side 2", "Audience Right" or "Stage Left")
tooltips.stepsFromFrontToAwayLabelBottom: Number of steps from the front sideline to the outside of the away number (closer to the back sideline)
tooltips.stepsFromFrontToAwayLabelTop: Number of steps from the front sideline to the inside of the away number (closer to the center of the field)
tooltips.stepsFromFrontToHomeLabel: Number of steps from the front sideline to the outside of the home number (closer to the front sideline)
tooltips.stepsFromFrontToHomeLabelTop: Number of steps from the front sideline to the inside of the home number (closer to the center of the field)
tooltips.stepSize: The size of each step on the field in inches or centimeters
tooltips.useHashes: Use hashes for the Y-checkpoints, like a football field. If unchecked, lines will be used.

warnings.xCheckpointsNotEquidistant: WARNING - The left and rightmost X-checkpoints are not equidistant from the center. This may cause strange graphical artifacts and should be fixed.
warnings.yCheckpointsNegative: WARNING - It is highly recommended that all Y-checkpoints' steps be less than zero (i.e. negative numbers). All of the Y-coordinates should be behind the front of the field. Failing to do so may cause graphical errors and unexpected coordinates.

shape.copyToNextPage: Copy this shape to the next page
shape.copyToPreviousPage: Copy this shape to the previous page
shape.errorCopyingPage: Error copying to page. Are there marchers already assigned to shapes?
shape.errorNoNextPage: Cannot copy. There is no next page
shape.errorNoPreviousPage: Cannot copy. There is no previous page.
shape.ungroupShapeTooltip: Delete this shape for this page. Will not move marchers from their current position

files.failedToRemoveRecent: Failed to remove file from recent list
files.title: Recent Files

troubleshooting.clearCache.description: Deleting the cache and metadata folder can often fix performance issues. (This will also delete your recent files list and theme!)
troubleshooting.description: OpenMarch is still under development, so here are some tips when something goes wrong.
troubleshooting.refresh.description: When in doubt, refresh the page (Ctrl/Cmd + R). If OpenMarch ever seems broken, refreshing will often fix it.
troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Tips

marchers.createError: {count, plural, one {Error creating marcher {drillNumbers}} other {Error creating marchers {drillNumbers}}}

marchers.deleteWarning: You are about to delete these marchers: {marchers}. This can be undone with [Crtl/Cmd+Z].

list.noMarchers: No marchers created yet. Why not create one?
list.noSectionStyles: No section styles defined yet. Add one to customize how each section appears.

marchers.title: Marchers

music.addNewTempoGroupAfter: Add a new tempo group after this one
music.deleteAllMeasures: Delete all measures and their associated pages
music.deleteAudioFileDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this audio file? This action cannot be undone.
music.deleteTempoGroupDescription: Deleting the tempo group will also delete all pages associated with it.
music.endTempoTooltip:
The new group will gradually go towards the end tempo, but will not reach it.
This is to create a smooth transition to a new group.
music.mixedMeterTooManyBeats: Mixed-meter shouldn't have more than {maxBeats} beats. It will make your computer sad. If you really need this, please contact us so we can hear your cool mixed-meter music that has {beatsPerMeasure} beats per measure.
music.name: Name
music.title: Music
music.undoWithCtrlZ: This action is undoable with Ctrl + Z

settings.plugins.refreshNotice: Please reload the app to update plugins.
settings.privacy.analytics.description: To help us improve OpenMarch, we collect analytics data, error logs, and session recordings. This helps us understand how you use the app and identify bugs. Read our privacy policy to learn more.
settings.privacy.analytics.description.opt_out: You can opt out of this if you'd prefer. Just know that OpenMarch is a free tool built by volunteers, and this data really helps us understand how designers are using the app and find bugs—especially when we don't hear about them right away on Discord or Facebook :)
settings.privacy.analytics.disabled: You are not sharing analytics. If you experience issues or bugs, we will not be aware of them. If you have an issue, please submit feedback so that we can address it.
settings.privacy.analytics.enabled: You're sharing usage analytics. Thank you for helping us improve OpenMarch for everyone.
settings.title: Settings

tempoGroup.differentBeatsError: Tempo group has different number of beats. This should not happen. Please reach out to us!

titlebar.bugReport.placeholder:
What went wrong?
What did you expect?
How can we reproduce the issue?
titlebar.databasePathError.description:
Failed to fetch .dots file path!

Please fully quit the app and try again.

If the issue persists, please reach out to support.

error.fetchFailed: An error occurred while fetching the version.
